author: David Nusspickel
comment: App stuck in 24 HR clock mode. When i reset in app, it does not save.
title: Not A fan

author: David Mastovich
comment: It must be built for a square watch because it doesn't cover the right side or the bottom it's just aBlank Space nice idea but doesn't work with my new Asus zenwatch 3

author: Humza Nasir
comment: This looks great, love the options, but there is a black bar on the right side of the watch (Moto 360 v2) as if it is compensating for the flat tire on the right side. Every thing is shifted to the left. Please fix this because I really want to use it!
title: Bug

author: Mark H.
comment: I love the interface and watchface but there is a problem on my 42mm Moto 360. There is another black bar on the right side of the screen which makes it unusable.
title: Another black bar on the screen

author: Andy Chaplin
comment: Looks great on my phone, and after a few problems with syncing, it now looks great on the Moto 360.
title: Perfectly seasonal!

author: June Arnold
comment: Simply perfect! So many settings you can choose. The face is very simple and great for the winter holidays.
title: Best holiday watch face ever!

author: Ted Miller
comment: Works on square faces, too. Thanks for all the animation option, but can we get more backgrounds, too?

reply.author: MaderDucker
reply.content: Hi Ted Miler, now we're working on new Watch Faces. But is a good idea add more backgrounds. We will work on it.

title: Becoming a must "watch"  developer

author: Gary Parizek
comment: Works great on a moto 360 but It will not work with hauwei watch, hope this can be fixed.

reply.author: MaderDucker
reply.content: Added the 12-24 hour option in the last update, ¡Merry Christmas!

title: 12 hour

author: Angelo Rohit
comment: Beautiful watch face. I wish it could show me the battery charge level. That would definitely be the frosting on the cake!

author: Kylie Dyer
comment: I like the adjustments just wish there was an option to show date.
title: Cool

author: M M
comment: Needs date and 12-24 option and it's drain the battry

reply.author: MaderDucker
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, added the 12-24 hour option in the last update.

author: Cesar Balcazar
comment: I get a black background and just the time on my moto 360

reply.author: MaderDucker
reply.content: We just fixed that in the last update. ¡Merry christmas!

author: Brittany Blackmon
comment: I've had a bug with this watch face where the time doesn't update when in ambient mode. While adorable and fun, it made using it as a watch face difficult.  Would love to see a fix. Thanks!

reply.author: MaderDucker
reply.content: Thanks for the bug report, the update in ambient mode is now fixed in version 1.1

title: So cute but doesn't update the time when in ambient mode

author: Tony Kaim
comment: Merry Christmas to all and to all a nice watch face :😛

author: Eddie Daniels
comment: Awesome face, for some reason on my moto 360 gen 2 the right side of the image has a "flat tire" also. Hope this gets fixed since it makes the whole thing off center

author: Stuart Hurcomb
comment: Looks nice but when installed on huawei watch it didn't show full screen and only covered about half of the face. Maybe not setup for Huawei watch resolution.
title: Didn't work on Huawei watch
